skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Front-end development involves creating the visible parts of a website that users interact with directly. It includes design, layout, and functionality to ensure a seamless user experience.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Back-end development involves building and maintaining the server-side components of websites and applications, handling databases, and ensuring functionality behind the scenes.

skills.title: Hardware Troubleshooting
skills.description: Hardware troubleshooting is the process of identifying and resolving issues or malfunctions in computer equipment and devices to restore their proper functionality.

skills.title: CCTV Installer
skills.description: A CCTV installer sets up and configures security camera systems to monitor and record activities in various locations for surveillance purposes.

portfolio.title: Landing Page
portfolio.description: A landing page is a focused single web page used for a specific purpose, like getting people to sign up, buy a product, or download content. It's designed to prompt quick action from visitors.

portfolio.title: Services
portfolio.description: Software Development: Creating and maintaining applications and programs tailored to specific needs.

portfolio.title: Contact Us
portfolio.description: A Contact Us form is a way for visitors to send messages to a website. They enter their details and message, making communication simple.

testimonial.description: What a fantastic website! The intuitive layout, fast loading times, and relevant information make it a go-to resource in its niche. It is responsive!
Impressive website! The sleek design and user-friendly interface make navigation a breeze, while the rich content kept me engaged and informed.
This website truly stands out! The seamless blend of aesthetics and functionality creates an enjoyable browsing experience, making it easy to find what I needed.
